short_summary: a Request for Proposal for Temporary Help Services against a Supply Arrangement
description: Temporary Help Services Requirement; Services d'aide temporaire requis; Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS
full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Temporary Help Services

**Project Title**: Temporary Help Services against Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Tender Reference Number**: CB-862-28883069

**Publication Date**: 2024-07-17

**Tender Closing Date**: **Expired**
As the tender closing date has passed, this procurement opportunity is no longer available.

### Description of Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region (NCR). This procurement is open to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) with the Government of Canada and are qualified under the relevant streams and categories, specifically:

* Stream 1.7: Clerk - Data Entry

### Invitation to Suppliers

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal for this requirement:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* BRYCA Solutions Inc.
* iFathom Corporation
* Labor Tek Personnel Services Ltd / Labor Tek Services de Personnel Ltee
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* MDOS CONSULTING INC.
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* Quality Staffing Pro Inc.
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* Teambuilder Consulting Inc.
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
* Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

### Important Information

* Level of Security Required: Secret
* Trade Agreements: CPTPP and CFTA
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contact Information

For more information about this procurement opportunity, please contact:

 CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
 Phone: (613) 971-7955
 Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)

### Attachments

The complete tender notice and associated documents can be found at the following link:

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41986/s4999338---rfp\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca
